Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/19/1966 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 4/8/1967 to a minor league deal...
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1971...
Released by New York (N) on 4/1/1971...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 4/1/1971 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/2/1971 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 9 weeks...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 1/31/1976 (Going to STL: LF T. Grieve. Going to CLE: P T. Forster, P B. Castro, P B. Apodaca)...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1977...
